This page showcases a collection of Steam games tagged under 'Point & Click'. Point & Click games are an interactive genre of adventure games where the user primarily relies on pointing and clicking the mouse to navigate the game, interact with objects, and solve puzzles. These games often involve intriguing narratives, detailed graphics, and challenging brainteasers that engage players in immersive experiences. The 'Point & Click' tag on SteamDB ensures automatic updates to this page, providing an up-to-date list of games for fans and enthusiasts of the genre.
